sub_title: Software Engineer (Java, PHP) | 2x AWS Certified | AWS Community Builder - Opinions are my own
summary:
// ONLY LOOKING FOR DevOps/SRE/Platform FOCUSED ROLES. //

Muhammad Sumon Molla Selim has been in software development for the last 10 years and designing efficient, scalable, and secure technology solutions. Currently, he is working as a Senior Software Engineer at Mimecast.

Have worked with the following technologies:
Languages:​ Java, PHP, JavaScript.
Frameworks/CMS: ​Laravel, Lumen, Symfony, CodeIgniter, WordPress.
Databases & Storage:​ MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, Memcached.
Version Control: ​Git with Smart Git Flow; used with Bitbucket, GitHub, Gitlab.
Frontend Development: ​HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind, Vue.js, Angular.js.
CI/CD: ​Bitbucket Pipelines, Gitlab CI/CD, GitHub Actions.
Others:​ Valet, Docker, Webpack, Yarn, OAuth, JWT.
Code Testing Tools: ​JUnit, PHPUnit, Behat, Codeception.
CLI: ​Fluent in Unix Terminal (bash, zsh).
Cloud Technologies:​ Amazon AWS, Digital Ocean, Google Cloud Platform.
Third-party API integration​: Facebook Graph, Twitter OAuth 2, PayPal, Stripe, etc.
SCRUM/Agile:​ Completed CSM Training and practicing SCRUM methodology at work.

Have knowledge of the following technologies:
Languages: ​Python, Go, C++.
Frameworks/CMS: ​Django, OpenEdx, Drupal.
Databases & Storage:​ PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch.

Learning and exploring:
Domain-driven development​ practices.
Cloud architecture and implementations.

Besides being a software engineer, he loves to promote coding to the youth. He is the founder of Klassroom.xyz, which is an educational platform and aims to empower the youth by providing quality skills development training and mentorship to battle the youth's biggest problems - unemployment, lack of skills.

He is an RSA fellow, One Young World Ambassador, Theirworld Global Youth Ambassador, and Yunus&Youth fellow.

If you need to know more, he is just a Google search away: https://www.google.com/search?q=Sumon+Selim
